locations.full_paragraph:
1. **Policy Terms**: Insurance coverage analysis assumes standard RIA insurance policy terms, including:
   - E&O: $25M limits, $250K retention, standard exclusions (prior acts, known circumstances, intentional fraud)
   - D&O: $15M/$30M tower, standard Side A/B/C coverage
   - Fiduciary Liability: $15M-$20M limits, ERISA prohibited transaction defense coverage
   - NO Cyber Insurance: Pinnacle confirmed no cyber policy in force

locations.content_excerpt:

   - E&O benchmark: 0.1% of AUM ($42.5M × 0.1% = $4.25M minimum recommended limits)
   - Current E&O limits ($25M) are $17.5M-$20M below b...
locations.full_paragraph:
3. **Coverage Gaps**: Identified insurance shortfalls assume:
   - E&O benchmark: 0.1% of AUM ($42.5M × 0.1% = $4.25M minimum recommended limits)
   - Current E&O limits ($25M) are $17.5M-$20M below benchmark
   - Cyber insurance recommended limits: $10M-$20M (forensics, notification, defense, settlements)
